name: Imagen 4 Ultra
capabilities: Ultra High-Quality Text-to-Image Generation: Best-in-class prompt adherence and image quality
Precision Text Rendering: Superior typography for professional graphics
Multiple Formats: PNG, JPEG, WebP output formats
Enhanced Prompt Following: Designed for outputs highly aligned with text prompts

rate_limits.default: Variable based on Gemini API limits
rate_limits.note: Can only generate one image at a time

features.ultra_quality: Highest quality image generation with superior prompt adherence
features.precision: Designed for outputs that precisely follow instructions

best_practices: Use for highest quality requirements where cost is not primary concern
Ideal for professional graphics, marketing materials, and detailed artwork
Leverage superior prompt adherence for complex requirements
Best choice when text rendering quality is critical
Allow for longer generation times due to quality optimization
examples: generate_image(prompt='Ultra-realistic product photography of luxury watch with precise lighting', model='imagen-4-ultra', quality='high')
generate_image(prompt='Professional poster design with text "Innovation Summit 2025" in modern typography', model='imagen-4-ultra')
